offer.name: BONUS YOSHIMURA MUFFLER & GENUINE SUZUKI QUICK-SHIFTER ON 2017 GSX-R1000 ABS

detail.content: We won the 2017 ASBK Championship, Now You Win!
Bonus Genuine Suzuki Quick-Shift System (fitting included FOC)
Bonus Yoshimura Alpha Stainless Slip-On Muffler

offer.content2: Celebrating Josh Waters and Team Suzuki ECSTAR Australia’s 2017 Australian Superbike Championship win, Suzuki is providing GSX-R1000 ABS customers a Genuine Suzuki Bi-directional Quick-Shifter and a Yoshimura Alpha slip-on track day muffler Free-of-Charge as part our Championship Bonus promotion.
